title: Bug 117981 - Cannot select any item on first try in library outline view
description:
Description: When trying to select an item in the library outline view, it cannot be selected on the first try. The focus jumps to the library file node instead.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select any item in the view.

Expected Behavior (EB): The item should be selected when clicked on.

Observed Behavior (OB): The focus jumps to the library file node and the item cannot be selected on the first try. However, on the second or subsequent tries, the item can be selected.
OB: When trying to select any item for the first time in the library outline view, the focus automatically jumps to the library file node instead.
EB: When I select the item for the first time in the library outline view, it should be selected as expected.
SR:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select any item in the view and observe the behavior.
